issue.title: [Rust]: Fix for null elems for DoubleEndedIter for DictArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10062](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10062). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A bug that I've introduced: during the reverse traversal the last element with null doesn't signal the completion.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10062?focusedCommentId=17200098) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8237
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8237>
